title: Longmada Crystal Dry Herb Atomizer
description: MSRP: $39.99The Crystal from Longmada uses their fence style heating element to provide even heat to the quartz heating chamber. It comes attached with a glass bubbler mouthpiece and screws onto any 510 mod.Replacement Bubbler and Coils available. FeaturesFence Heating System360 Degree Heating ChamberOnce Piece Quart
cleaned_text: Description MSRP: $39.99 The Crystal from Longmada uses their fence style heating element to provide even heat to the quartz heating chamber. It comes attached with a glass bubbler mouthpiece and screws onto any 510 mod. Replacement [Bubbler](https://yocanwholesale.com/products/longmada-crystal-dry-herb-replacement-bubbler) and [Coils](https://yocanwholesale.com/products/longmada-crystal-replacement-dry-herb-coil) available. Features Fence Heating System 360 Degree Heating Chamber Once Piece Quartz Chamber Easy Loading, Easy Cleaning Replaceable Glass Top Cap Specifications 510 Threaded In The Box 1 Crystal Atomizer 1 Dab Tool 1 Manual Card
